name: Rapier
desc:
Effective against horseback and armored units.
Can be used by Lords.

name: Runesword
desc: Uses MAG to determine damage. Drains HP from enemy

name: Wind Sword
desc: Uses MAG to determine damage. Grants SPD+3.

name: Tactical Edge
desc: Targets the lower of foe's DEF/RES.  Javi only.

name: Muramasa
desc:
Heals 50% of damage dealt.
Emeline only.

name: Flame Spear
desc: Uses MAG to determine damage. Grants MAG +3.

name: Reginleif
desc: Effective against horseback and armoured units.

name: Tungstrom
desc: Uses SKL to calculate damage. Xeconis only.

name: Kismet
desc:
Grants +2 LCK after defeating a foe (max +10).
Resets on end chapter. Pykroe only.

name: Devil Axe
desc:
User may receive damage equal to damage dealt.
Proc Rate = (31 - LCK)% (Min 0%)

name: Swordslayer
desc: Reverses the weapon triangle. Effective against sword fighters

name: Neodymium Hammer
desc:
Effective against armored units, grants Hit+50 vs armored units.
Joker only.

name: Manaflaer
desc:
Uses MAG to determine damage.
Targets the lower of foe's DEF/RES. Sages only.

name: Spread Ballista
desc:
A bow turret that hits all units in the AoE.
Cannot crit or double.
Ignores user's STR stat.

name: Bronze Dagger
desc: Inflicts SKL/DEF/RES -1 on hit. Cannot crit.

name: Poison Knife
desc:
Inflicts <red>poison</> after combat.
Inflicts STR/MAG -2 on hit.

name: Smoke Kunai
desc: Inflicts LCK/DEF/RES-2 on foe on hit and foes within 2 spaces of target after combat. Smoke Only.

name: Carwennan
desc:
Grants LCK+5.
Inflicts LCK-5 on hit.

name: Invigorate
desc: Ensures ally's next attack will be a critical hit.

name: Reconcile
desc: Restores (User's MAG + 5) HP to all adjacent allies.

name: Fortify
desc: Restores (User's Magic + 10) HP to all allies within range.

name: Nudge
desc: Restores (User's MAG + 7) HP then shoves ally 1 space.

name: Trade
desc: Trade with a far away ally.

name: Silence
desc: Enemy is rendered unable to use magic.
components: unit.wexp['Light'] or unit.wexp['Anima'] or unit.wexp['Dark'] or unit.wexp['Staff']

name: Hex
desc: Inflicts -3 to all stats on an enemy (recovers 1/turn).

name: Snooze
desc: Enemy cannot move or attack, removed after combat.

name: Float
desc: Allows an ally to fly for 5 turns.

name: Hammerne
desc: Repair an item to full uses.

name: Thief
desc:
Steal from enemies with RES < unit's MAG.
Maxime only.

name: Inspirit
desc:
Grants ally STR+4 and Canter (1) for one turn.
Leap only.

name: Prognosticate
desc:
Grants ally Avoid +20 for 1 turn.
Frost only.

name: Rescue
desc: Bring an ally to a space adjacent to the user

name: Entrap
desc: Bring an enemy to a space adjacent to the user

name: Entrap
desc: Brings an enemy adjacent to unit.

name: Entrap
desc: Brings an enemy adjacent to unit.

name: Entrap
desc: Bring an enemy to a space adjacent to the user

name: Warp
desc: Move an ally to another square.

name: Switcheroo
desc:
Switches the position of unit and target ally.
Leap only.

name: Latona
desc: Restores HP and condition of all allied units

name: Gust
desc:
Propels unit backwards one space.
Cannot double.

name: Zephyr
desc: If unit initiates combat, pushes enemy up to two spaces after combat.

name: Downburst
desc: Attack in a straight line of 3 tiles.
components: x == 0 or y == 0 or x == y or x == -y

name: Blizzard
desc:
Damages huge area, AOE 3. 
Inflicts MOV-1.

name: Sandblast
desc: Affects small sized area, AOE 1. Blinds foes.

name: Magic Textbook
desc: Dark's practicing tome. x1.5 exp and wexp gained.

name: Fire Crystal
desc:
A valuable fire infused magic crystal. Cannot crit, double or be equipped. 
Ignores user's MAG stat.

name: Fire Orb
desc:
A fire magic turret that hits all units in the AoE.
Cannot crit or double.
Ignores user's MAG stat.

name: Nosferatu
desc: User recovers HP equal to half damage dealt.

name: Banshee
desc: Inflicts -6 MOV on foe for a turn.

name: Nightmare
desc:
Can only target sleeping foes, removes sleep on hit.
Sal only.

name: Doze
desc: Sends all enemies in range 3 to sleep

name: Sketchy Salve
desc: A dubious medicine sold by Morshu.

name: Torch
desc: Increases user's sight range in fog of war

name: Angelic Robe
desc: Permanently raises maximum HP by 7 points.

name: Metis's Tome
desc: Permanently raises all of the user's growth rates by 5.

name: Fili Shield
desc: Negates effective bonus of bows and wind magic toward user.

name: Hoplon Guard
desc: User is immune to critical attacks.

name: Powernap
desc: Unit fully heals, but falls asleep for 2 turns.

name: Rally Str
desc: Grants STR+3 to all allies within 2 spaces.

name: Rally Mag
desc: Grants MAG+3 to all allies within 2 spaces.

name: Rally Skl
desc: Grants SKL+4 to all allies within 2 spaces.

name: Rally Lck
desc: Grants LCK+5 to all allies within 2 spaces.

name: Rally Spd
desc: Grants SPD+3 to all allies within 2 spaces.

name: Rally Def
desc: Grants DEF+4 to all allies within 2 spaces.

name: Rally Res
desc: Grants RES+4 to all allies within 2 spaces.

name: Rally Mov
desc: Grants MOV+1 to all allies within 2 spaces.

name: Shove
desc: Pushes target ally a space away.

name: Smite
desc: Pushes target ally up to 2 spaces away.

name: Draw Back
desc: Moves unit and target ally 1 space backwards.

name: Advance
desc: Unit moves with target ally 1 space forward.

name: Reposition
desc: Moves target ally to the opposite side of unit.

name: Pivot
desc: Moves unit to the opposite side of target ally.

name: Trap
desc:
Unit can place a trap at target location.
When a unit steps on trap, their move is interrupted.

name: Sacrifice
desc: Unit loses 10 HP to heal an ally 10 HP.
